speaker: Zara
line: Hey multiverse fans, welcome to Interdimensional Radio!

speaker: Milo
line: First up, did you know the quantum kettle can brew coffee before you even think about it?

speaker: Luna
line: …and it also whispers your secrets back to you. *spooky laugh*

speaker: Dex
line: Whoa, hold up! If the kettle's gossiping, does it also spill the beans on my dating life?

speaker: Nova
line: Guys, the real wow moment: we just got a live transmission from a parallel Earth where cats run the government!

speaker: Milo
line: Seriously? Do they have catnip policies?

speaker: Luna
line: Only if you bring tuna tax receipts!

speaker: Dex
line: Okay, okay, I'm officially out‑of‑this‑world confused. *pretends to be a cat* Meow‑tivation, anyone?

speaker: Zara
line: And that’s your 60‑second interdimensional scoop—mind‑blown, right?
